statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_id = 1;
SELECT sale_date, product_id FROM SalesData WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, quantity, amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_id IN (3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT sale_date FROM SalesData;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY amount DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, amount FROM SalesData WHERE amount < 5000
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity, amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, age FROM demographic WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM sales JOIN demographic ON sales.sales_id = demographic.customer_id;
SELECT product_id, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT sales_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT sales_id, sale_date, sale_amount, age, gender FROM sales s JOIN demographic d ON s.sales_id = d.customer_id WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales_count FROM sales GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT city, state FROM demographic_data WHERE age_group='Young';
SELECT * FROM combined_data WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT city, state, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM demographic_data GROUP BY city, state;
SELECT product_name, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(sale_amount) > 1000;

SELECT cd.sale_id, dd.city, sd.product_name, cd.total_sales FROM combined_data cd JOIN demographic_data dd ON cd.demographic_id = dd.demographic_id JOIN sales_data sd ON cd.sale_id = sd.sale_id WHERE cd.prediction_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date, product_name FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT city, state, age_range FROM demographic_data ORDER BY state DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date, sale_id FROM sales_data
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount, product_name, sale_id FROM sales_data
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM DemographicData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, quantity, sale_date FROM CombinedData WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_status, prediction_date, prediction_value FROM DemandPredictions WHERE prediction_status = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM DemographicData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM CombinedData WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT sales_id, customer_id, prediction_status, prediction_date, prediction_value FROM DemandPredictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
